scripts.build:zip: node -e "require('child_process').exec(process.platform === 'win32' ? 'powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File build-plugin.ps1' : 'bash build-plugin-unix.sh', (err, stdout, stderr) => { if (err) { console.error(err); process.exit(1); } console.log(stdout); })"
scripts.build:zip:clean: node -e "require('child_process').exec(process.platform === 'win32' ? 'powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File build-plugin.ps1 -Cleanup' : 'bash build-plugin-unix.sh --cleanup', (err, stdout, stderr) => { if (err) { console.error(err); process.exit(1); } console.log(stdout); })"
